name: PropertyListSerialization
desc: An object that converts between a property list and one of several serialized representations.

items.name: class func data(fromPropertyList: Any, format: PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat, options: PropertyListSerialization.WriteOptions) -> Data
items.desc: Returns an NSData object containing a given property list in a specified format.

items.name: class func writePropertyList(Any, to: OutputStream, format: PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat, options: PropertyListSerialization.WriteOptions, error: NSErrorPointer) -> Int
items.desc: Writes a property list to the specified stream.

items.name: class func propertyList(from: Data, options: PropertyListSerialization.ReadOptions, format: UnsafeMutablePointer<PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat>?) -> Any
items.desc: Creates and returns a property list from the specified data.

items.name: class func propertyList(with: InputStream, options: PropertyListSerialization.ReadOptions, format: UnsafeMutablePointer<PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat>?) -> Any
items.desc: Creates and returns a property list by reading from the specified stream.

items.name: class func propertyList(Any, isValidFor: PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given property list is valid for a given format.

items.name: struct PropertyListSerialization.MutabilityOptions
items.desc: These constants specify mutability options in property lists.

items.name: enum PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat
items.desc: These constants are used to specify a property list serialization format.

items.name: typealias PropertyListSerialization.ReadOptions
items.desc: The only read options supported are described in PropertyListSerialization.MutabilityOptions.

items.name: var NSPropertyListReadCorruptError: Int
items.desc: Parsing of the property list failed.

items.name: var NSPropertyListReadUnknownVersionError: Int
items.desc: The version number of the property list cannot be determined.

items.name: var NSPropertyListReadStreamError: Int
items.desc: Reading of the property list failed.

items.name: var NSPropertyListWriteStreamError: Int
items.desc: Writing to the property list failed.

items.name: var NSPropertyListWriteInvalidError: Int
items.desc: Writing failed because of an invalid property list object, or an invalid property list type was specified.

items.name: var NSPropertyListErrorMinimum: Int
items.desc: The start of the range of error codes reserved for property list errors.

items.name: var NSPropertyListErrorMaximum: Int
items.desc: The end of the range of error codes reserved for property list errors.
